changeChannel(String) - Method in class User
Changes channel to specified channel and requests the message history from the server.
channel - Variable in class MessageToClient
the channel from the client
channel - Variable in class MessageToServer

channelExists(String) - Method in class Server.SockServer
Searches the channel list to see if the specified channel already exists.
channelExists(String) - Method in class User
Sees if user already is a part of a channel with this name

this field stores the reference to the text field object the user writes their channel name in

channels - Variable in class User
this is the array list that stores all the channels the user belongs to
client - Static variable in class GeneralController
a reference to the client who is working with the server
client - Variable in class User
this is the socket the client connects to in order to interact with the server
close() - Method in class User
this function closes all the streams
closeConnection() - Method in class Server.SockServer
Shuts down the server and closes all of its connections and streams.
connection - Variable in class Server.SockServer

currentChannel - Variable in class User
